effects: Physical water damage (2.5x, ATK) to one enemy
Increase ATK by 80% for 5 turns to caster
Add Water element to physical attacks for 5 turn(s) to caster
name: Aquatic Slash
Aquatic Slash
水靈一體之刃
물정령의 칼날
Entaille aquatique
Wasserseelenklinge
Sablazo ártico
desc_short: Water damage one enemy, boost own ATK, and add water element to own physical attack
對1名敵人發動水屬性的攻擊+提高自身攻擊的數值+將物理攻擊賦予水屬性
적 1명에게 물속성 피해+사용자의 공격력 상승+물리공격에 물속성 부여
Inflige des dégâts d'eau à un ennemi, augmente l'ATT et ajoute l'élément eau aux attaques physiques du lanceur
Fügt einem Gegner Wasserschaden zu, erhöht eigene ANG und fügt eigenem phys. Angriff Wasserelement hinzu.
Daño de agua a un enemigo, aumenta el ATQ del usuario y añade elemento agua a los ataques físicos propios
